horana rajamaha wiharaye 27 wana waratath pawathwanu labana nawam maha pinkam malawa horana rajamaha wiharadhipathi rajakiya panditha horana panynyasekara na himiyange anushasakathwayen me masa pura pawathwimata katayuthu yoda atha.me masa 18 wani da rathri 7 ta gombaddala damitha himiyange dam desumada, 19 wani da 6.30 ta gampola nyanaloka himiyange dam desumada, 20 wanida 7.00 ta dodamduwe sirikara himiyange dam desumada, 21 wani da, rathri 7.00 ta pannala nyanaloka himiyange kawya dam desumada, 22 wanida rathri 7.00 ta suriyagoda siridhamma himiyange dam desumada, 23 wani da rathri 7.00 ta boralasgamuwe samitha himiyange sathbudu pujawada, 24 wani da sawasa 6.30 ta olaboduwe wajiranyana himiyange thesaththa nyana pujawada pawathwimata katayuthu yoda atha.

mema naduwa pasugiya wasare nowambar thun wana da diyath kala athara, ihala adhikaranaya, pebarawari wisithun wana da naduwa sambandha kriyawan awasan kirimata pera nadu asime wara thispahak pawathwa thibini. 1990 dashakaye, sharif, agamathiwaraya lesa dewarak katayuthu kala samaye ohu wisin sidukarana lada mudal jawaramak ha mema naduwa bandi atha.

ethanin dakunu paththe pare api tika durak yanakota, ee kiyanne weheragala diwishan eka pahu karala api yanne blak wud diwishan eka madin.
sathyaya wasan kara ardha sathyaya gena hara pamin minisun rawatima, amulika boru kiya rawatimata wada sarthaka ya.
